metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10753 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the delayed_output function in music.c in abcm2ps through 8.13.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: abcm2ps: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
